Author: snefferu
Text: I don‚Äôt count calories because I found it didn‚Äôt work for me in recovery (even when using the counting to make sure I was getting enough). Author: ShAzzExD
Text: I find when i have higher calorie days i tend to loose weight the first day, say i have been eating 650 for a week and then i feel good and have a 1400 day i lose alot usaly 0.5-1kg though this is probably just water
